resources.string: This is an improved version for School Idol Points Calculator. I designed it for School Idol Festival players. It has various features, as a calculator which tells you how many songs you have to play in a certain event, in order to achieve your own goal.

These values are optional for you to set them. In fact they are only used during a token collection event, to calculate whether you can rank up playing only the event song. This is very useful when you run out of LP and have gathered enough tokens to rank up. If so, a message like \"you can RANK UP playing the event!\" will show up at your token collection event screen. When you don\'t want it to show those messages just fill these two fields with 0 and touch on \"Save Values\" button.
